reviewText: If you are a true die hard AC/DC Fan from way back then you will want to add this DVD to your collection.  Especially, if you want to know more about Bon Scott before his timely passing.  It contains similar content to other AC/DC DVD's, yet it reveals new footage that was not seen before.  I would recommend to add it your colleciton!

THEY ARE THE  BEST ! ! !  BAND.
